item.title: Report X-2025020455
item.description:
Report X-2025020455

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: A LEAKING HAZMAT WAS DISCOVERED ON THE TWILIGHT SORT. RESPONDER USED ALL NECESSARY PPE AND DECISION TREE.PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED SPILL TUB AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING ALONG WITH THE AFFECTED PACKAGES.
